Text:
I loved this and I was wondering if you could help me with the following, at you convenience. 

1. Methods for Development Work and Research, by Britha Mikkelsen. Sage, New Delhi, 2005.

2. Cognitive Interviewing: A Tool for Improving Questionnaire Design, by Gordon B Willis. Sage, USA, 2004. 

3. Statistics without Tears: A Primer for Non-Mathematicians, by Derek Rowntree, Penguin, London, 2003. 

4. Statistics Unplugged, by Sally Caldwell. Wadsworth, USA, 2006. 

5.Qualitative Data Analysis, by Matthew B Miles and A Michael Huberman, Sage, USA, 1994. 

6. The Craft of Research, by WC Booth, JM Williams, and GG Colomb. University of Chicago Press, 2003.

Or anything to do with research, M&E and international  development.  Thanks in advance.

Wo wo ....
Preety long list. Last 2 titles are may be available. Rests to look further. Keep watching ...
